project_abstract.cdata: The Housing Sector Project's key objectives include (a) improvements in the institutional framework, (b) greater efficiency in the use of public resources, (c) housing stock expansion for lower income groups, and (d) elimination of key bottlenecks to recovery in the construction industry.  The project comprises (a) support for immediate imports of construction materials to initiate subdivision development, (b) a time slice  of the National Home Mortgage Finance Corporation's (NHMFC) investment program and (c) associated technical assistance, training, equipment and studies.
